attributes.action: Outlaw any kind of arranged marriage in the U.K.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is no reason in nature why any two people, if physicallly capable and so minded, should not be able to have a child.  Therefore any attempt to prevent free association, marriage and ultimately the birth of a child on cultural or religious grounds should be outlawed.  Conversely any action applying pressure or coercion of any kind to any person to marry within a particular cultural or religiuos group should also be outlawed.

rejection.details: Forced marriage is already illegal in the UK.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
